name: Stronk The Barbarian
description:
Game Info
Initial release date: 20th Of April 2017
Engine: Game Maker Studios
Developer: Second Life Game Studios
Designer: Terrabot
Platforms: Microsoft Windows.
Genres: Action, Adventure, 2D Platformer, RPG.

Storyline
Stronk is a barbarian that lives in his home village called Shrinton in the world of Vulgaria. Vulgaria gets attacked by unknown creatures that try to take over the world. Stronk follows a unknown ship full of fellow friends towards Vulgarias capital called Versta to release his village friends and defeat the unknown.

Second Life Game Studios©

Founded 12/4/2017

After testing out game could you please leave us a rating, suggestion and tell us any bugs or glitches you experienced in the comment appropiate section or the discussion pages on our steam group! after all this is the point of a early access game!

Stronk The Barbarian Development Team:
Lead Programmer: Terrabot.
Lead Game Designer: Terrabot.
Lead Level Designer: Terrabot.
Lead Graphic Design: The Salt Shaker, Terrabot.
Marketing: Terrabot.
Voice Actor: Ragnar.
Writer: Terrabot.
Music: Ozzed.

A special thanks to all the beta testers supporting our game!

Any kind and thoughtful donations will be accepted :D
